high_descs: Turn around and walk to the open box.
Pick up the open box from the ground.
Walk to the table lamp in front of you.
anns.task_desc: Examine an open, empty box by the light of a table lamp.

high_descs: Turn around and stand in front of the open box on the floor.
Pick up the box from the floor.
Go forward and face the brown table on your right.
Turn on the lamp that's on the table.
anns.task_desc: Turn on a lamp after picking up a box from the floor.

high_descs: Face the box on the floor.
Pick up the box from the floor.
Bring the box to the dresser.
Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
anns.task_desc: Turn on the lamp on the dresser.
